main event: Multiple unidentified flying objects were observed in the sky over Yuma, Arizona, between June 19 and July 24, 1952.
interesting points: A woman observed a bright, steady light that appeared star-like and spiraled in the sky., A physician reported seeing a zig-zagging object around 2000 feet above his home., The objects changed color from reddish to yellowish-white during sightings., A resident in Port Washington, New York, described 3-4 bright objects hovering and moving quickly before disappearing., Multiple reports from civilians and military personnel indicated unusual aerial activity during this period.
witness description: Civilians including a woman with her husband, a physician, and individuals reporting to authorities.
